resources.string: I\'m a 21 year old computer engineering student from Croatia.\n I grew up in Osijek, Croatia. Ever since I was a kid, I had an interest in computers and tech in general. Two years ago, I enrolled in the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Computer Science and Information Technology Osijek.\n Since then, I realized I wanted to devote my time to Android Development and well, here we are.

The first \"job\" I worked at was provided to me by the Erasmus+ student mobility programme. We worked at a warehouse in Ireland and although it wasn\'t exactly a computer science related job, it was still a valuable experience because I learned teamwork and it helped with my English.\n\n Since then, I worked via the Student Union at my college on various side-jobs. No programming related work until now, but I\'m hoping this academy will change that.

I graduated from the Electrical Engineering and Traffic School Osijek in the Electrical Engineering vocational course.\n After that, I enrolled in the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Computer Science and Information Technology Osijek.\n Right now, I\'m attending Osijek Software City's Android Dev Academy.

Business email: david.takac@etfos.hr
 Phone number: +385 91 123 4567
 Smoke signals: one long puff of smoke and three small ones.
